DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial evaluate completeness strut coverage vessel wall response ( strut malapposition , neoin-timal formation ) bio-active-stent ( BAS ) versus ever-olimus-eluting stent ( EES ) implant treatment culprit lesion acute coronary syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Vessel Wall Response Bio-Active-stent Everolimus-Eluting Stent Assessed By Optical Coherence Tomography
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , randomize control study compare coverage BAS EES implant acute coronary syndrome . Clinical follow-up 1 , 6 , 12 18 month . OCT analysis time 6 8 month follow-up .
